item.title: Getting Started with Vagrant: Vagrantfile
item.description: Recap In my previous post, I discussed what Vagrant is, some details about getting it installed, and then the structure of a basic Vagrant deployment. In this post, we’ll cover in a bit more depth how to define virtual machines in Vagrant using a Vagrantfile. If you recall from that previous post, we initialized a VM using Vagrant’s init command. I mentioned that this creates a basic configuration. But what is that exactly?
